titleStmt.title: A map of merry conceites wherein is contained much mirth which may yeeld pleasureto [sic] the reader, delight to the hearer, content to the buyer, profit to the seller, and hindrance to no man : the book : all you that doe spie me, come quickly & buy me, if once you doe [sic] try me, you will not deny me / by Laurence Price.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

titleStmt.title: A map of merry conceites wherein is contained much mirth which may yeeld pleasureto [sic] the reader, delight to the hearer, content to the buyer, profit to the seller, and hindrance to no man : the book : all you that doe spie me, come quickly & buy me, if once you doe [sic] try me, you will not deny me / by Laurence Price.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for Francis Grove, and are to be sold at his shop on Snow-hill neer the Sarazens head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
